description: Did you like June's Nintendo Direct?
title: Nintendo Direct June 2024 Explainer

description:
Nintendo brought a ton of HD remakes and a few surprises to their showcase like Marvel vs. Capcom 2 Fighting Collection Arcade Classics, Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Remake, The Legend Of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom, and Metroid Prime 4: Beyond.

Mario & Luigi Brothership - 00:00:00
Nintendo World Championships NES Edition - 00:02:45
Fairy Tail 2 - 00:04:14
Fantasian Neo Dimension - 00:05:13
Nintendo Switch Sports Basketball - 00:06:25
Mio Memories In Orbit - 00:07:26:00
Disney Illusion Island Update - 00:08:32
Hello Kitty Island Adventure - 00:09:04
Looney Tunes Wacky World of Sports - 00:09:37
Among Us Update - 00:10:11
Farmagia - 00:10:35
Donkey Kong Country Returns HD - 00:11:53
Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Remake - 00:13:35
Funko Fusion - 00:16:47
Luigi's Masnion 2 HD - 00:17:44

Darkest Dungeon 2 - 00:19:30
N64, The legend of Zelda: A link to the Past Fours Swords, Metroid: Zero Mission, Turok: Dinosaur Hunter, Perfect Dark - 00:20:0
title: Nintendo Direct Full Showcase | June 2024

description: Samus Aran is back! Metroid Prime 4: Beyond will be released on Nintendo Switch in 2025.
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Official Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024

description:
It's up to Princess Zelda to save Hyrule in a brand-new The Legend of Zelda story. 

The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom launches September 26th on Nintendo Switch!
title: The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom Official Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024

description: The biggest Mario Party yet, Super Mario Party Jamboree launches on Nintendo Switch October 17th! Take on over 110 minigames, 7 game boards (5 new boards and 2 returning boards), and join up to 20 players head-to-head online in Koopathlon mode!
title: Super Mario Party Jamboree Offical Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024

description:
Travel through vast worlds and discover where the legendary DRAGON QUEST franchise began with the stunning DRAGON QUEST III HD-2D remake and the newly announced DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake!! 

DRAGON QUEST III HD-2D Remake comes to Nintendo Switch on November 14, 2024.
DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake comes to Nintendo Switch in 2025.

#DragonQuest #NintendoSwitch #gaming
title: DRAGON QUEST III HD 2D Remake Official Release Date Trailer | Nintendo Direct

description:
The king of Kong returns!

Originally released on the Wii system,  Donkey Kong Country Returns HD is barreling onto Nintendo Switch January 16th!

Enjoy 80 levels, including the additional levels from the Nintendo 3DS version, and join up with a buddy for 2-player local co-op!
title: Donkey Kong Country Returns HD Official Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024

description: Prep the airlock and join your Crewmates in a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal in Among Us! All new Roles (Noisemaker, Tracker, and Phantom) add another layer of deception - out now on Nintendo Switch!
title: Among Us New Roles Official Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024

description:
The bond between brothers has never been stronger! Set sail for an island-hopping adventure with the Mario Bros. in Mario & Luigi: Brothership!

Launching November 7th 2024 on Nintendo Switch.
title: Mario & Luigi: Brothership Official Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024

description:
From Software's expansion for Elden Ring offers an entire new game's worth of content, all of which is exceptionally executed.

Shadow of the Erdtree takes players to the Land of Shadow, a place that has been hidden away, where the laws of the venerated Golden Order that governs The Lands Between were written in blood, and that has been forgotten and left to fester. Battling through the Land of Shadow's numerous castles, caves, and crypts delivers exactly what you want from a From Software game and what made Elden Ring an open-world masterpiece when it was released two years ago. It offers the same thrilling sense of player-empowered exploration and rewarding discovery, as well as the satisfaction of triumphing over adversity. These aspects of Elden Ring are all as potent in Shadow of the Erdtree, but it's the game's subversions that are the most striking.
title: Elden Ring: Shadow Of The Erdtree DLC Review
